actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law

official_title: A concurrent resolution calling upon the President to grant asylum to those individuals who asylum in the United States rather than serve in the South African Armed Forces in support of apartheid.

summary.text: Calls upon the President to grant asylum in the United States to individuals who do not want to serve in the armed forces of South Africa because of the policy of apartheid.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution calling upon the President to grant asylum to those individuals who asylum in the United States rather than serve in the South African Armed Forces in support of apartheid.
